typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DimTableName as string,
		DimID as integer,
		DimCode as string,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string,
		DimActive as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PortfolioDimensionTables
source(output(
		TermDimTable as string,
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as long,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermAvailable as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyDimensionTerms
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		DimTable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LookupType
PortfolioDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)
ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(Preferred = true()) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn, LookupType lookup(DimTableName == DimTable,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID,
		Preferred,
		TermTypeID_LookUp = LookupType@TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForInsertion
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	)) ~> SelectForDeletion
SelectForDeletion alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> MarkForDeletion
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		TermAvailable,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForUpdate
SelectForUpdate alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> MarkForUpdate
SelectForInsertion alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(TermTypeID_LookUp)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 filter(not(isNull(TermTypeID_LookUp))) ~> RemoveNullTermTypeID
ConditionalSplit@Update derive(DimName = iif(isNull(DimName), ' ', DimName),
		TermName = iif(isNull(TermName), ' ', TermName),
		TermDescription = iif(isNull(TermDescription), ' ', TermDescription),
		DimDescription = iif(isNull(DimDescription), ' ', DimDescription),
		{ DimActive} = iif(isNull(DimActive), true(), DimActive),
		{ TermAvailable} = iif(isNull(TermAvailable), true(), TermAvailable),
		DimCode = iif(isNull(DimCode), ' ', DimCode),
		{ TermCode} = iif(isNull(TermCode), ' ', TermCode)) ~> DerivedReplaceNullsColumn1
DerivedReplaceNullsColumn1 filter(not((DimName == TermName) && (TermDescription == DimDescription) && (DimActive == TermAvailable) && (DimCode == TermCode))) ~> Filter1
RemoveNullTermTypeID sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermCode = DimCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred,
		Available = DimActive,
		TermTypeID = TermTypeID_LookUp
	)) ~> SinkIntoTermTaxonomy
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID']) ~> DeleteTerm
MarkForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Available = TermAvailable,
		DimID,
		Preferred = TermPreferred,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateSink
